Hi all, this might be out of topics. But I just want to share it anyway.

There is a proposed for GM (Global Majority) community hub at Devcon SEA, where we will explore and discover regional specific challenges, and potential solutions that blockchain could address. Please show your supports and share your opinion on the proposal.

Link to the forum: https://forum.devcon.org/t/sea-community-hub-proposal-gm-global-majority-hub/3925
